channel.title: osgi on ebullient·works
channel.description: Recent content in osgi on ebullient·works

item.title: Interview with Alex Blewitt: OSGi and Liberty
item.description:
I sat down with Alex Blewitt while at OSGi DevCon to talk about Liberty and how it uses OSGi to do ridiculous things.

The interview has just been published to InfoQ.

item.title: OSGi DevCon 2014: Building a right-sized, do-anything runtime using OSGi technologies
item.description: This was a fun conference. In NYC, co-located with QCon and filled with lots of great people. Explaining the crazy things Liberty does is also a blast.
